item.title: The Downfall Of 60 Minutes And The Biggest Media Scandal You’ve Never Heard Of
item.description: Last week, 60 Minutes' executive producer Bill Owens resigned in protest — but Owens and the rest of the news program have never taken responsibility ...

item.description: The time to listen to black men is apparently over if they have the temerity to stray from gender orthodoxy.

item.title: Newly Released Emails Show Politicized FBI Targeting Trump Officials For Obeying The Law
